thread.title: Maintenance work delays Condor Liberation
thread.title_full: Maintenance work delays Condor Liberation | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Maintenance work delays Condor Liberation
text:
The Condor Liberation won't be arriving in Jersey this evening as it has been held up in Poole.
Work to re-attach an outside cover for one of the evacuation slides resulted in the vessel leaving Poole two and a half hours later than planned.
She will sail into Guernsey later on this evening but will not complete the journey on to Jersey.
Condor says it is providing food and accommodation for the passengers who are delayed overnight.
The company has organised direct sailings between Poole and Jersey tomorrow evening to make up for the delayed service.
Click here for the latest sailing information on the company's website.
Last updated Tue 15 Sep 2015 Travel Guernsey Jersey
